posts.post_content: Does anyone have a low grade or nonPSA'd Sweeney for sale?  This would be for an Easter present for my son... Also open to suggestions as to what a ool early yankee or Highlander card would be as a gift... nothing too mint or expensive.  Thanks.
I can hook you up.  PM me please.

I have a T205 Sweeney for sale on my for sale or trade site.  $60 postage included.  Here is the link:

[url]www.imageevent.com/brailey[/url]
then go to T205 page.

Best regards,
Mike Brailey
Email:   [url]mikebrailey@yahoo.com[/url]
